name: www.kumari.net
comments: The TLS certificate is for *.kumari.net, allowing you to test the use of wildcards.

name: www.bortzmeyer.org
comments: The CA is CAcert, a free CA that is not commonly configured in web browsers. So, PKIX won't work.

name: badhash.dane.huque.com
comments: The signed TLSA record (DANE-EE) contains a hash value that doesn't match the server certificate.
